DESCRIPTION:
Game Dev Tycoon - a simulator of the game developer. The action begins in the 80s, when there is only the gaming industry. Starting from the garage, text-based games and two-dimensional graphics, and finally, a MMORPG, and even his best-selling console. In the process you have to hire and train staff, create and update game engines. Make AAA title just does not work, so, at first, you will need to focus now only on certain aspects of the game. Advertise their creations at various exhibitions. Remember, your game must be original. Get high marks from gaming publications and sales soar. Success of your company and even the gaming industry is in your hands. Rewrite the history igrostroya.
